homepage.title: Wormhole Network
homepage.description: A decentralized cross-chain messaging protocol, for DeFi
homepage.subtext: A new way to natively interact with foreign chains

openForBiz.title: The portal is open.
openForBiz.body: Wormhole delivers new communication channels between previously siloed blockchains.

aboutUs.heading: How it works
aboutUs.body: Wormhole is a simple, generic protocol that delivers a pathway for any kind of information—funds, votes, programs and more—from any blockchain in the network to any other.

network.heading: Network
network.title: A trustless protocol validated by 19 separate guardians.
network.body: Our network of independent validators ensures the Wormhole protocol remains trustless and secure.
network.partnersAnimationAltText: Independent validators run the Guardians that make up the network.

whatWeDo.heading: Why
whatWeDo.problem: Recalculating the state of a foreign chain in a smart contract is a redundant and expensive workload.
whatWeDo.title: Wormhole treats canonical chain state for what it truly is - arbitrary data with well understood tamper-proofing requirements.
whatWeDo.body: You and your contracts just want to look stuff up. Wormhole makes it easier.

404.message: The page you visited does not exist

brief.heading: About
brief.title: Simple, generic, trustless, decentralized, fast.
brief.body: The world of blockchain is evolving daily, and evolution requires communication.

how.body: Wormhole builds bridges between chains, facilitating fast transfer of any kind of information from one chain to another.

steps.2: The Guardian network observes the transaction
steps.4: Guardians make your attested message publicly available.
steps.5: Access your message on a different chain

readMore.heading: The next frontier in blockchain technology is communication.
readMore.title: Wormhole is the protocol that makes it possible.
